Home page show case description: Create a new list effortlessly. Simply tap the + button, input a title, set a deadline using the date icon, and save.
Single list screen edit list show case d: To manage your list effectively, simply tap here. You can edit the title, set deadlines, and rearrange items. Remember to save your changes.
Single list screen add item show case de: Quickly add items to your list or set reminders with a simple tap on the + button.
Notifications show case description: Explore, manage, and customize your notifications all in one place. Add new notifications and edit existing ones.
Notifications state show case descriptio: Enhance your notification management effortlessly. Toggle between active and disabled statuses with a single tap on the bell icon, while conveniently checking if notifications are already archived.
Content show case description: Manage your content by adding text, links, and phone numbers to your items.
